s:pt presents with moderate weight loss, moderate feeling of increasing tiredness and moderate pencil thin stools. td.content: s:patient presents with 5 days history of moderate weight loss, moderate feeling of increasing tiredness and moderate pencil thin stools. pt is a 41 yr old M cryptographer. o:Height 162 cm, Weight 55.8 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 68, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Colon Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 425 mg/m2 IV, Leucovorin - 20 mg/m2 IV, and ordered Double-contrast barium enema.
